___mem.description: Memory to allocate to this mongodb-admin instance.

___host_volume.description: The location of a volume on the host to be used for persisting  data. The final location will be derived from this value plus the name set in `name` (e.g. `/mnt/host_volume/mongodb-admin`). This can be a mounted NFS drive. Note that this path must be the same on all DC/OS agents.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to this mongodb-admin instance.

___db_username.description: The username for the database connection.

___db_password.description: The password fot the database user.

___db_location.description: The name of the database location to connect to.

___db_port.description: The port where the database is listening on in the location above.

___external_access.description:
Enable access from outside the cluster through Marathon-LB.
 PLEASE NOTE THIS CONNECTION IS UNENCRYPTED. USE FOR DEVELOPMENT AND TESTING ONLY.

___virtual_host.description: For external access, Virtual Host URL to be used in the external load balancer.

___external_access_port.description: For external access, port number to be used for clear communication in the external Marathon-LB load balancer

___enable.description: Enable or disable creating a VIP for external access through a public node running Marathon-LB.
